en.title: **1st Prize** – Duo Developers
en.text: Won in the Duo Developers event at CabdOGNEBULA '25, a National Level Technical Symposium. Grateful for this opportunity and the support from everyone! ₹2000 cash prize.

en.title: **Codevolt '25** – National Hackathon
en.info: VIT Chennai, in collaboration with Raptee.HV and Zoho
en.text: Participated in a 42-hour hackathon tackling real-world industry challenges. Built innovative tech prototypes in a high-pressure environment. An unforgettable professional experience that sparked creativity and collaboration.

en.title: **1st Prize** – Code Twisters
en.info: Xtrefest 6.0, Flarendo '24, Sri Sairam Engineering College
en.text: Secured 1st Prize in the Code Twisters event organized by the Department of IT. Recognized for hard work, teamwork, and coding excellence. ₹2000 cash prize.

en.title: **1st Place** – GLITCHED, Hackerz
en.text: Achieved 1st place in the GLITCHED event. Competed against skilled developers and demonstrated strong problem-solving capabilities. ₹2000 cash prize.

en.title: **1st Prize** – INMATRIX'24
en.text: Won 1st place in the INMATRIX'24 coding challenge. Demonstrated programming skill and quick thinking in a competitive environment. ₹1000 cash prize.

en.title: **Finalist** – CODE N' SURGE Hackathon
en.text: Built a full-stack web app using React and Firebase during this National Level Hackathon. Reached the final round. Gained insights into collaborative coding and Git workflows while witnessing diverse tech approaches.

en.title: **Participant** – CodeQuezt Contest
en.text: Took part in a competitive DSA-focused contest. Applied algorithmic knowledge in real-time problem solving and enhanced coding confidence. A big step forward in my programming journey.

en.title: **VTECH SPARK-2K24** – Paper Presentation & Coding
en.info: Vel Tech R&D Institute of Science and Technology
en.text: Participated in technical paper presentation, Brain Bush quiz, and various coding contests. Gained exposure to research, public speaking, and peer learning. Special thanks to Dr. Jeevaa Katiravan for the opportunity.
